text: A whimsical and amusing scene featuring a green frog that is anthropomorphized. The frog is wearing clear swimming goggles and finds itself in a very human-like scenario. It is sitting at a wooden desk in front of a vintage typewriter, surrounded by scattered papers and a hot cup of tea. It looks a bit disgruntled, portraying the common struggle of focusing on work. Please depict the light coming from the desk lamp, heightening the serious mood of the moment despite the comedic nature of the scene.
